summary: Do you think that they're not enough Trolls in Skyrim? Or that Trolls are too small, weak or slow? Then this is the mod for you... otherwise, you wasted your time reading this.
descriptionHtml:
[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3] Do you think that they're not enough Trolls in Skyrim? Or that Trolls are too small, weak or slow? Then this is the mod for you... otherwise, you wasted your time reading this.[/SIZE][/FONT]

[CENTER][COLOR=#c00000][SIZE=7][B]Trolls of Skyrim[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR][line][/CENTER]

[COLOR=#c00000][SIZE=6][B][U]What's the Mod About?[/B][/U][/SIZE][/COLOR]

[FONT=Book Antiqua][SIZE=5] This mod is meant to overhaul the Trolls of TESV: Skyrim. I have made this mod before on my old account 'GuitarZeppole,' but have now added some much needed features including a new troll species! This mod will be as lore-friendly as I can make it - so you won't be weirded out by the new trolls, in other words.[/SIZE][/FONT][line]

[COLOR=#c00000][SIZE=6][B][U]Current Content[/U][/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]

[FONT=Book Antiqua][SIZE=5]>All Vanilla Trolls' size, speed and level are adjusted. [U]Frost Troll[/U]= Sizex1.4 & Player Lvlx1.2= it's level. [U]Troll[/U]= Sizex1.2 & Same level as player. [U]Udefrytke[/U]= Sizex1.4 & Lvlx1.5= it's level.[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Book Antiqua][SIZE=5]>New Trolls of the Reach [I]aka[/I] [U]Aspen Trolls[/U]. They have orange fur, they were mutated from the tree's pollen, no one knows exactly how. Sizex0.09 of Vanilla Trolls & Player Lvlx1.1= it's level.[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Book Antiqua][SIZE=5]>All Trolls speed are 1.2 times Vanilla.[/SIZE][/FONT][line]
author: KigamNogard
